text: A thing I don't always see discussed enough regarding neurodiversity is that it isn't only ADHD and Autism traits. I see people treat those traits associated with it as the only defining ones of being ND and that's just exclusionary and hurts those who may be ND in other ways.

text:
an empty well cries
a reservoir of tears
being internally unique is being
invisible.a brain mapped 
uniquely indivisible.
neurodiversity hides in 
the fringes.blending in is not in
our nature.streaming tears never seen.
living in the spaces in between.

#vsspoem #bravewrite
